Articles.Content:
I have made a space station that has enough seats and fuel etc. but generating power part is causing me some problems. I brought up a fuel cell thinking I needed that to get the generating power parameter and it didn't work. I also have plenty of solar panels.

I'm kinda confused on this issue, any help would be appreciated.

Thanks, dday

Edited July 10, 2015 by dday8080
figured it out

Having any sort of solar panels is, AFAIK, enough to satisfy 'generating power' - perhaps you also need a battery? Though I'd have thought any sort of command pod or core would satisfy that requirement. Certainly a solar panel should satisfy that.

Wemb

Doesn't it have three conditions in that check (docking port, antenna, power generation)? Do you have the other two? I designed my later tourist craft to meet the minimal station requirements, but forgot the antenna first time...
